Title: Tales of Kish
Director: Abolfazl Jalili, Mohsen Makhmalbaf, Naser Taghvai
Writer: Abolfazl Jalili (segment), Mohsen Makhmalbaf (segment), Naser Taghvai (segment)
Actors: Hossein Panahi, Atefeh Razavi, Hafez Pakdel, Mohamad A. Babhan
Plot: A three episodic film made by three famous Iranian directors. The Greek Boat, the Ring and the Door which all are take place in Kish Island in south of Iran.
